session.content: My partner and I have this tradition of traveling somewhere new every anniversary - it's our way of keeping things fresh.
That sounds like a wonderful tradition! How long have you been doing it?
We've been doing it for about five years now. It's always exciting to explore a new place together.
I bet you have some amazing memories from those trips. Do you have a favorite destination so far?
Definitely! Our trip to Japan was unforgettable. The culture, food, and scenery were just incredible.
Japan sounds amazing! Do you have any plans for your next anniversary trip?
